name: BombSquad

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=bombsquad

apt -y update; apt -y install wget
cd /mnt/server

wget -r -l 1 -nd --accept-regex ".*_Server_Linux_x86_64_*"                          \
        'https://files.ballistica.net/bombsquad/builds/';                           \
        rm index.html; tar --strip-components=1 -xzvf BombSquad_Server_*.tar.gz*;   \
        rm BombSquad_Server_*.tar.gz; chmod +x bombsquad_server
